title: Here's what worked the last time stagflation reared its ugly head, according to Goldman Sachs
text:
Biden says he doesn't have the votes to increase corporate taxes

President Joe Biden appears to have conceded that he doesn't have the votes to increase corporate taxes. See full story.

Snap points to possibility of Apple causing the long-feared â€˜ad-mageddon'

Snap sounded the alarm for the long-feared internet advertising meltdown that could be coming in the normally busy fourth quarter. See full story.

For one day, SPACs don't feel whack, thanks to WeWork and Trump's DWAC

Donald Trump's social media ... 'startup' (?) SPAC is an instant MAGA meme stock, while WeWork finally debuts. See full story.

Best New Ideas in Money: The new science of changing your financial behavior

In the new episode of the podcast, a deep dive on how to edit your money and investing habits See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

'Both parents still live in it, but one requires a full time caretaker. As far as bank accounts go, they are all set up with joint owners and beneficiaries.' See full story.
